title: Zion Williamson, Kyrie Irving, LeBron James, being a leader, and Tom Brady
itunes:title: Zion Williamson, Kyrie Irving, LeBron James, being a leader, and Tom Brady
description:
Colin discusses how Duke F Zion Williamson will make more money from his injury, why he likes vocal leaders, why Boston Celtics G Kyrie Irving is overreacting to the media, why Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James is smart to rest his body, and New England Patriots QB Tom Brady taking another pay cut. Guests include Chris Broussard, T. J. Houshmandzadeh, and Daryl Morey.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
